location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H. Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris to Lieut. W. Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H. Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran] to Lieut. W. Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, requesting Bruce to provide details on the payments made to Cornet Willock for feeding troop horses and to Andrew Jukes Esq. for translations from Persian.
